title: the Circular Economy and Miscellaneous Provisions Act 2022 (No. 26 of
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Circular Economy and Miscellaneous
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Circular Economy and Miscellaneous 

Provisions Act 2022 (Commencement of Certain Provisions) Order 2023.
text_norm: 1 order may cited circular economy miscellaneous provision act 2022 (commencement certain provisions) order 2023

title: the Circular Economy and Miscellaneous Provisions Act 2022 (No. 26 of
heading: 2. The 24th day of February 2023 is appointed as the day on which -
text_raw:
2. The 24th day of February 2023 is appointed as the day on which - 

(a) 

paragraphs (a), (b) and (c) of subsection (1), and 

(b) 

subsection (2), 

of section 26 of the Circular Economy and Miscellaneous Provisions Act 2022 
(No. 26 of 2022) shall come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal 

14 February, 2023. 

EAMON RYAN, 

Minister for the Environment, Climate and 
Communications. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 17th February, 2023.
